short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides Shortcut's Docs card in case you don't want that feature taking up space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides Shortcut.com's Docs card in case you don't use that feature and don't want it to push everything important "below the fold" of the browser window.
